title: Chapter XI - New York State Energy Research And Development Authority
content:
Chapter XI - New York State Energy Research And Development Authority

State Regulations

Part 500 - Procedure (§ 500.1 to 500.3)

Part 501 - Public Access To Records (§ 501.1 to 501.10)

Part 502 - Reports By Generators Of Low-level Radioactive Waste (§ 502.1 to 502.6)

Part 503 - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act (§ 503.1 to 503.3)

Part 504 - Prompt Payment Policy Statement (§ 504.1 to 504.12)

Part 505 - Personal Privacy Protection (§ 505.1 to 505.11)

Part 506 - Purchase Of Energy Efficient Products (§ 506.1 to 506.6)

Part 507 - CO2 Allowance Auction Program (§ 507.1 to 507.13)

Part 508 - Green Residential Building Program (§ 508.1 to 508.12)

Part 509

Part 510 - Evaluation Criteria for Determining the Cost Effectiveness of Proposed Changes to the Energy Conservation Construction Code of New York State (§ 510.1 to 510.7)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
